EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the 3 reasons to upgrade your aircraft brochure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},Thank you for downloading the 3 reasons to upgrade your aircraft <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_Textron_Three-Reasons-Upgrade-Aircraft-Comms_Brochure.pdf]]> brochure in cooperation with Textron Aviation. To receive a copy of the brochure, please click the link below.
Let’s Connect: Sign up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AERO_Preference_Center.html]]> to stay in the loop with us, and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. Download Brochure Now <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_Textron_Three-Reasons-Upgrade-Aircraft-Comms_Brochure.pdf]]>
